title: PERMANENTLY BANNED??
body: so i get a permanent banned after getting insulted by a top??? like how am i inflamatory when i get called stupid while quietly playing the game? summoner code logic. yes lets judge the guy for responding to insults but the other person its fine? ok. Seems fair. I even muted the kid after insulting me and me insulting him to avoid conflict but of course that doesnt get reviewed also right?

replies.body:
> like how am i inflamatory when i get called stupid while quietly playing the game?

>yes lets judge the guy for responding to insults but the other person its fine?

I mean you caught yourself in a lie within one line lol
well the question was. if i call you stupid and such. how is inmflamatory getting offended? im having a bad day i didnt need the kid talking smack with his duo supporting the idea.
shoulda tried this little thing called muting, works great for me

yes i did right after like i said we both called each other names. but the fact he started and he gets off seems there is something wrong here. idk how to pull the log but how can he punch someone, get punch back in self defense, and get away? if thats the way fair is. i suppose. but the initial instigator shouldnt have the right to say anything after breaking the rules. we both broke them its a fact. but him getting away with it seems like somebody didnt do the tribunal system justice.

> yes i did right after like i said we both called each other names.

Then you muted too late.

> but the fact he started and he gets off seems there is something wrong here. idk how to pull the log but how can he punch someone, get punch back in self defense, and get away?

Did you report him? Because that's literally the only prerequisite to a review and a punishment. If you didn't report him, it's your fault he "got away".

> but him getting away with it seems like somebody didnt do the tribunal system justice.

The Tribunal's been dead for years. The current punishment system is the IFS (Instant Feedback System), an automated system that reviews reported players' matches and decides if it warrants a punishment. Which, as mentioned - the only prerequisite to a player's chat being reviewed and potentially punished is that you report them.
everything umbral said, also you have no idea if he got punished or not.

>  quietly playing the game?

> responding to insults 

Those two are mutually exclusive. If you were quietly playing the game, you would not have been responding to insults.

> after insulting me and me insulting him to avoid conflict

How is you insulting him avoiding conflict? 

> but of course that doesnt get reviewed also right?

If you reported the other player, their chat was reviewed and handled in based on their behavior/history.

> I even muted the kid

This should have been the only reaction in game. A proper response to this behavior is:

#**Mute. Report. Move on.**

like i said you are right i shouldnt have reacted the way i did. but i muted afterwards idk if he said anything else. i didnt report bc i also insulted so i felt even. but you gonna tell me a thief trying to kill the owner of a house gets to sue the owner for getting shot while tresspassing? ill take the ban sure move to another games. but the logic the instigator gets to report just because him and his duo were angry isnt fair. call it what you must sure i could have been quiet but the initial issue that started the whole argument was him. you dont cause a traffic accident and leave the scene.

>quietly playing the game....responding to insults...

If you recently came off a 2 week, then a permanent ban was the next progression. What is it that you said that got you punished?__
my 2 week ban was last season so i understand how it works. what i found unfair is, if i didnt start it how he get off while instigating a fight.
"Last season" as in, less than a month ago?

Punishment tiers only go down if you play many games without getting a legitimate report filed against you.  Could be this guy managed to get rightfully reported often enough to keep the tier from degrading, but not often enough to trigger a punishment for an entire year.  It's unlikely but not impossible.

Either way Riot needs a better way for people to see their punishment tier progression.
No, I mean, there's a clear exact 14-day vacation in his match history in mid-December.

vacation as in i didnt play my friend. not my ban. In december most jobs make you work extra hours and you need the extra money for presents and to make up for short checks after the holidays. i play the game when i can. i got banned before that. i dont know how to get the exact date but if i find out i will. but thats irrelevant to this case. the last ban i deserved. i instigated and i traded a lot of insults with another player the whole game. i got banned i learned to not do that. but this one i didnt instigate if i find how to post the chat i would but idk how. like i said this has never been an issue the 4plus years i have played this game.
Alright that's fair.

> i didnt report bc i also insulted so i felt even.

That's how. If you don't report someone, they won't get punished. If you're going to complain that someone else didn't get punished, and you didn't report them simply because you were satisfied with insulting them back, _you are the one who let him go._

https://i.imgur.com/ACZhFYu.png

This shows how Riot's punishment system works.  Unless you're trying to convince us that this permanent ban was completely out of the blue, which means the punishment system broke and you need to make a support ticket, you're not telling us the full/true story.

Let's see those chat logs, shall we?

i been trying to get the chat logs how can i get them? and i made a ticket maybe they can tell me how to pull the logs. but like i said i dont see how you can insult a person who since the beginning was just in voice chat with his duo. and then report him for talking back once. like i said i defended myself because i felt abused. and i muted bc i saw any other type of conversation with this individual would have lead to nothing. i see i could have proceed it straight to the mute button, but the question is how is the perpetrator getting away with it.

This chart deserves to be placed at the top of the Player Behavior boards
People will say things like "kys" and question why they got a 14 day ban

>so i get a permanent banned after getting insulted by a top?

No, you got **PUNISHED** for **RETALIATING**. If you got a perma, you had a 14-day ban before meaning you didn't learn your lessen the first 3 times or you used slurs/invitation to self harm.

>like how am i inflamatory when i get called stupid while quietly playing the game? summoner code logic.

he said something bad therefore i'm in no way, shape or form inflamatory. OP logic.

>yes lets judge the guy for responding to insults but the other person its fine? ok. Seems fair.

It actually is fair for both of you to get punished.

>I even muted the kid after insulting me and** me insulting him
**

Mute him BEFORE retaliating to avoid punishment. Speaking of, you were on really thin ice there because of your 14-day ban.

Chat logs can help people see what the issue was but yet you didn't put them here which makes it seem like you are trying to hide the fact that it was probably well deserved.

Also you said "I even muted the kid after insulting me and me insulting him to avoid conflict but" so you insulted him back and that's never the right answer.

insulting back. you are right not the right choice. but trading insults in any occassions both people are to blame not just 1. just like in a fight. i get people get mad when you dont gank but insulting them doesnt get any point across. i insulted afterwards, yeah not right, but i didnt start it or keep it going. i stopped it right there.

also dont assume im hiding anything. its just my first time with this situation so i dont know how to pull a chat log. so excuse me. i opened a ticket because after being around for 5 seasons it just seems out of place for the first time.
